wikipedia_page.main: John H. Beynon FRS (29 December 1923 – 24 August 2015) was a Welsh chemist and physicist known for his work in mass spectrometry.

response: *John H. Beynon (1923–2015), Welsh scientist in the field of mass spectrometry

To mark the 80th birthday of John H. Beynon, the founding Editor of RCM, in 2004 an annual award was established in his honour by the publishers. The award is made on the recommendation of an ad hoc Sub-committee of the Editorial Board of RCM.
*John H. Beynon, 91, Welsh chemist and physicist.
